body_html:
Anyone ever make progress on this? Using retrain.py with a Tesla K80 and noticed only half the GPU is used since it appears as two devices.

Can I switch to the slim retraining code without adjusting anything else? Using inceptionV3 from the TF for poets post and really would like to fully use the GPU. Appreciate any help.
